description: Complete system overview detailing the architecture, component interactions, and core functionality of the browser screenshot tool
Detailed documentation of the core screenshot algorithms including viewport scrolling logic, section detection, and image merging processes
Documentation of browser detection, connection management, and platform-specific handling including debug mode operations and cleanup procedures
Specification of data models including ImageFormat enum, capture configurations, and browser management structures
Documentation of data and control flow between core components (BrowserManager, CaptureManager, ImageProcessor) including async operations and error handling
